name: python_motion_planning A* Smoke Test
description: Install dependencies, import the library, and run a minimal 2D grid A* planning demo from the repo to verify the code runs end-to-end and produces a valid (non-empty) path without errors.
goal: use the repos A* code to run a demo and and produce a non-empty path
metrics: path_found == true AND path_length > 0 AND no_exceptions == true
